impression: [item] Dilatation of the common bile duct to 0.9 cm, raising concern for distal obstruction. [item] Gallbladder distended. Would correlate with LFTs. [item]  MRCP or ERCP could be considered for further evaluation. [item] Findings suggest mild hepatic cirrhosis. Small volume ascites noted tracking about the upper abdomen. [item] Small bilateral pleural effusions noted.
